Name: Morte
Description: A lesser demon that must draw form and sentience from other sources.

Name: Seama
Description: A pelagic multiped that occasionally leaves the sea to torment the land.

Name: Cannon Morte
Description: A morte that has possessed a cannon and gained the ability to hurl fire.

Name: Aello
Description: A half-bird creature that can raise winds with its wings.

Name: Ghost
Description: An apparition that slows the movement of whomever it touches.

Name: Dullahammer
Description: An undead knight that wields his own head as a weapon.

Name: Giant Rat
Description: A monstrous rodent attended by a retinue of smaller rats.

Name: Bone Morte
Description: A morte that has possessed a human, destroying its flesh in the process.

Name: Bat
Description: A bat, but really evil.

Name: Gieremund
Description: A jet black wolf whose hunger is insatiable.

Name: Blood Grinder Knight
Description: A demon knight who deftly wields his spinning blade.

Name: Sabnock
Description: A toughened, leonine warrior demon.

Name: Moco Weed
Description: Predatory grass that snaps at anyone foolish enough to tread on it.

Name: Toad
Description: A savage amphibian that feasts on human flesh.

Name: Plume Parma
Description: A floating, pig-like creature with a carnivorous bent.

Name: Barbatos
Description: A fearsome marksman who never misses his quarry.

Name: Carabosse
Description: A jealous, evil faerie who dispenses curses.

Name: Simian
Description: A murderous ape with no concept of mercy.

Name: Zagan
Description: A demon who has assumed the form of a cow.

Name: Poltergeist
Description: A portrait that has come to life. It seeks new subjects for its canvas.

Name: Ordog
Description: A fiery hellhound composed of rotting flesh.

Name: Gargoyle
Description: A stone statue that sorcery has brought to life.

Name: Killer Barber
Description: A murderous barber turned demonic. He's seeking pretty women to scissor.

Name: Demon
Description: A denizen of the demon realm. Practices sorcery.

Name: Buer
Description: A leonine demon with five legs.

Name: Nyabon
Description: A reanimated cat that perished inside the castle and has a grudge to settle.

Name: Scythe Mite
Description: A giant bug with an unquenchable thirst for blood.

Name: Dullahammer Head
Description: A dullahammer head that lives on as a separate, vengeful entity.

Name: Buer Armor
Description: A demonic knight that uses buers as throwing weapons.

Name: Wolfman
Description: A monster whose lupine hunger for human flesh awakens at the full moon.

Name: Thunder Elemental
Description: A magical manifestation of thunder birthed by wicked means.

Name: Carriage Morte
Description: A morte that has seized a gun carriage and acquired mobility.

Name: Dantalion
Description: A demon who inhabits a book.

Name: Rul'sha
Description: A lovely winged demoness who gives blessings to those she favors.

Name: Decarabia
Description: A demon who presides over the stars. Well versed in gemstones.

Name: Shovel Armor
Description: A demon knight who skillfully wields his shovel.

Name: Malediction
Description: A dullahammer head that has gained the power to turn prey to stone.

Name: Celaeno
Description: A half-bird creature with power over thunderclouds.

Name: Shield Outsider
Description: A defender of the castle whose shield is among the demon realm's finest.

Name: Puppy
Description: The reanimated head of a hound that perished inside the castle.

Name: Lili
Description: A half-rabbit demon who has lopped off many a head.

Name: Assassin
Description: An assassin turned monster.

Name: Dragon
Description: A monster known for its extraordinary battle prowess.

Name: Kunekune
Description: An eldritch creature that inflicts a fatal curse on whomever it detects.

Name: Poison Toad
Description: An amphibian that secretes a deadly poison through its skin.

Name: Sidhe
Description: A wicked faerie who spirits away children.

Name: Bomber Morte
Description: A morte that has fused with a bomb. Keep away from open flames.

Name: Mimic
Description: A predator that disguises itself as a treasure chest.

Name: Light Elemental
Description: A magical manifestation of light birthed by wicked means.

Name: Ocypete
Description: A half-bird creature that carries off human prey in the blink of an eye.

Name: Cyhyraeth
Description: A demon with a chilling death cry.

Name: Chair Mimic
Description: A creature that poses as a chair and spirits unwitting sitters elsewhere.

Name: Leraje
Description: A demon skilled at archery.

Name: Bloodbringer
Description: A demon who inhabits a sword and has put countless criminals to death.

Name: Lance Armor
Description: An argent, lance-wielding knight.

Name: Tamako-Death
Description: A battle-of-the-bands guitarist who melts faces, both literally and figuratively.

Name: Triwheel Buer
Description: A three-wheeled chariot created through demon experimentation.

Name: Gamigin
Description: A demon in horse form who meddles with the souls of the dead.

Name: Titania
Description: A vespine faerie with dire poison in her sting.

Name: Axe Outsider
Description: A toughened knight in armor who wields a magically modified axe.

Name: Scylla
Description: A water monster with the head and torso of a beautiful woman.

Name: Forneus
Description: A demon fish that survived the age of myth.

Name: Deeseama
Description: A monster that hails from the aphotic reaches of the ocean.

Name: Water Leaper
Description: An amphibious monster with wings and a serpent's tail. Also called "Llamhigyn Y Dwr."

Name: Glashtyn
Description: A monster that drags victims into the water. Often called a "water horse."

Name: Seeker
Description: A fiend that moves from wall to wall, training its evil gaze on passersby.

Name: Archdemon
Description: A member of the demon nobility. Proficient in sorcery.

Name: Amy
Description: A flame kindled by ill intent.

Name: Allocer
Description: A leonine demon with eyes that burn red as hellfire.

Name: Vul'sha
Description: A lovely demoness who is fond of slaughter.

Name: Living Fossil
Description: Dragon bones imbued with false life by dark means.

Name: Rocky
Description: The reanimated head of a hound that perished inside the castle.

Name: Dark Elemental
Description: A magical manifestation of darkness birthed by wicked means.

Name: Lamashtu
Description: A malevolent goddess proficient with the lash.

Name: Macaron
Description: A reanimated cat that perished inside the castle and has a grudge to settle.

Name: Blood Bug
Description: A baleful insect with a jet black shell.

Name: Fire Elemental
Description: A magical manifestation of the fire birthed by wicked means.

Name: Volcano Morte
Description: A powerful morte that has drawn power from lava.

Name: Hellhound
Description: A mad, murderous dog mantled in flame.

Name: Zepar
Description: A lance-wielding demon knight clad in crimson armor.

Name: Deathtrap
Description: A predator that disguises itself as a particularly enticing treasure chest.

Name: Gusion
Description: A demon who takes the form of an ape.

Name: Gaap
Description: A hideous, one-eyed demon.

Name: Haagenti
Description: A winged, golden demon prized for its exquisitely flavorful meat.

Name: Kamikaze
Description: A reanimated cat that perished inside the castle and has a grudge to settle.

Name: Ninja
Description: An assassin from the Orient turned monster.

Name: Giant Moco
Description: Predatory grass made immense through arcane experimentation.

Name: Giant Bat
Description: An evil bat made immense through arcane experimentation.

Name: Giant Toad
Description: A savage amphibian made immense through arcane experimentation.

Name: Giant Cannon
Description: A gigantic demon cannon, as you'd expect from the name.

Name: Giant Morte
Description: A mass of lesser demons who seem to believe less can be more.

Name: Giant Buer
Description: A buer made immense through untold sorcery.

Name: Chariot Buer
Description: A new and improved demon chariot.

Name: Marbas
Description: A leonine demon with the power to heal.

Name: Silver Wolfman
Description: A wolfman with a coat of breathtaking silver.

Name: Abyssal Guardian
Description: A jet black dragon that brings death to all before it.

Name: Harrier
Description: A man in constant search of one faster than himself.

Name: Ice Elemental
Description: A magical manifestation of ice birthed by wicked means.

Name: Tracer
Description: A fiend that lurks in walls

Name: Gusion Cannon
Description: A demon cannon that fires other demons.

Name: G Axe Outsider
Description: A toughened knight in armor who skillfully wields an enormous axe.

Name: Demon Lord
Description: A member of demon royalty. Commands unfathomable sorcery.

Name: Eight Bit Zombie
Description: A zombie who has been banished to another dimension inside a book

Name: Eight Bit Ghost
Description: A ghost who has been banished to another dimension inside a book.

Name: Eight Bit Skull
Description: A skull from a dark void that was sealed in a tome.

Name: Eight Bit Overlord
Description: A demon overlord who has been banished to another dimension inside a book.

Name: Master Carpenter
Description: A demon carpenter gifted at summoning.

Name: Revenant
Description: A brave demon warrior who possesses skill with the whip.

Name: Millionaire's Bane
Description: The spirit of a greedy people awaiting either destruction or salvation.

Name: Vepar
Description: A sea-demon feared for hailing storms and casting ships into the abyss.

Name: Zangetsu
Description: A demonslayer from the Far East who crossed the sea in search of revenge.

Name: Craftwork
Description: Stained glass imbued with regret and with wrath after being broken time and again.

Name: Andrealphus
Description: A demon with a stunning, peacock-like panoply of feathers.

Name: Valac
Description: A twin-headed, demon drake who rules over the tower.

Name: Glutton Train
Description: A demon that fused with a train's engine, causing it to run amok.

Name: Bathin
Description: A demon with the ability to reflect like light.

Name: Gebel
Description: A man who was offered to hell but managed to survive. Miriam's friend.

Name: Bloodless
Description: A vampire who can manipulate blood. She bathes thrice a day without fail.

Name: Alfred
Description: A grey-bearded alchemist who had a hand in the demon summoning ritual.

Name: Doppelganger
Description: A demon that assumes the form of whatever it intends to kill.

Name: Orobas
Description: A demon who can alter gravity's pull on himself. Half-man, half-stallion.

Name: Zangetsu
Description: The strongest demonslayer who crossed the sea in search of revenge.

Name: Valefar
Description: A demon who draws power from coin. His fortune has waned of late.

Name: Gremory
Description: A demoness of half-human, half-beast form. She presides over the moon.

Name: Dominique
Description: A fool who believed demonic power would aller her to transcend God.

Name: Bael
Description: King of Kings, and high ruler over all demonkind.

Name: Orlok Dracule
Description: A vampire who presides over the library. He can manipulate time.

Name: That IGA boss
Description: (lol. Do you guys have his info and stats???)
